segment.source: Windows ADK for Windows 10 scenarios for IT Pros (Windows 10)
segment.target: Windows ADK for Windows 10 scenarios for IT Pros (Windows 10)

segment.source: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) contains tools that can be used by IT Pros to deploy Windows.
segment.target: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) contains tools that can be used by IT Pros to deploy Windows.

segment.source: Windows ADK for Windows 10 scenarios for IT Pros
segment.target: Windows ADK for Windows 10 scenarios for IT Pros

segment.source: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) contains tools that can be used by IT Pros to deploy Windows.
segment.target: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) contains tools that can be used by IT Pros to deploy Windows.

segment.source: For an overview of what's new in the Windows ADK for Windows 10, see What's new in kits and tools.
segment.target: For an overview of what's new in the Windows ADK for Windows 10, see What's new in kits and tools.

segment.source: In previous releases of Windows, the Windows ADK docs were published on both TechNet and the MSDN Hardware Dev Center.
segment.target: In previous releases of Windows, the Windows ADK docs were published on both TechNet and the MSDN Hardware Dev Center.

segment.source: Starting with the Windows 10 release, Windows ADK documentation is available on the MSDN Hardware Dev Center.
segment.target: Starting with the Windows 10 release, Windows ADK documentation is available on the MSDN Hardware Dev Center.

segment.source: For the Windows 10 ADK reference content, see Desktop manufacturing.
segment.target: For the Windows 10 ADK reference content, see Desktop manufacturing.

segment.source: Here are some key scenarios that will help you find the content on the MSDN Hardware Dev Center.
segment.target: Here are some key scenarios that will help you find the content on the MSDN Hardware Dev Center.

segment.source: Create a Windows image using command-line tools
segment.target: Create a Windows image using command-line tools

segment.source: DISM is used to mount and service Windows images.
segment.target: DISM is used to mount and service Windows images.

segment.source: Here are some things you can do with DISM:
segment.target: Here are some things you can do with DISM:

segment.source: Mount an offline image
segment.target: Mount an offline image

segment.source: Add drivers to an offline image
segment.target: Add drivers to an offline image

segment.source: Enable or disable Windows features
segment.target: Enable or disable Windows features

segment.source: Add or remove packages
segment.target: Add or remove packages

segment.source: Add language packs
segment.target: Add language packs

segment.source: Add Universal Windows apps
segment.target: Add Universal Windows apps

segment.source: Upgrade the Windows edition
segment.target: Upgrade the Windows edition

segment.source: Sysprep prepares a Windows installation for imaging and allows you to capture a customized installation.
segment.target: Sysprep prepares a Windows installation for imaging and allows you to capture a customized installation.

segment.source: Here are some things you can do with Sysprep:
segment.target: Here are some things you can do with Sysprep:

segment.source: Generalize a Windows installation
segment.target: Generalize a Windows installation

segment.source: Customize the default user profile
segment.target: Customize the default user profile

segment.source: Use answer files
segment.target: Use answer files

segment.source: Windows PE (WinPE) is a small operating system used to boot a computer that does not have an operating system.
segment.target: Windows PE (WinPE) is a small operating system used to boot a computer that does not have an operating system.

segment.source: You can boot to Windows PE and then install a new operating system, recover data, or repair an existing operating system.
segment.target: You can boot to Windows PE and then install a new operating system, recover data, or repair an existing operating system.

segment.source: Here are ways you can create a WinPE image:
segment.target: Here are ways you can create a WinPE image:

segment.source: Create a bootable USB drive
segment.target: Create a bootable USB drive

segment.source: Create a Boot CD, DVD, ISO, or VHD
segment.target: Create a Boot CD, DVD, ISO, or VHD

segment.source: Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE) is a recovery environment that can repair common operating system problems.
segment.target: Windows Recovery Environment (Windows RE) is a recovery environment that can repair common operating system problems.

segment.source: Here are some things you can do with Windows RE:
segment.target: Here are some things you can do with Windows RE:

segment.source: Customize Windows RE
segment.target: Customize Windows RE

segment.source: Push-button reset
segment.target: Push-button reset

segment.source: Windows System Image Manager (Windows SIM) helps you create answer files that change Windows settings and run scripts during installation.
segment.target: Windows System Image Manager (Windows SIM) helps you create answer files that change Windows settings and run scripts during installation.

segment.source: Here are some things you can do with Windows SIM:
segment.target: Here are some things you can do with Windows SIM:

segment.source: Create answer file
segment.target: Create answer file

segment.source: Add a driver path to an answer file
segment.target: Add a driver path to an answer file

segment.source: Add a package to an answer file
segment.target: Add a package to an answer file

segment.source: Add a custom command to an answer file
segment.target: Add a custom command to an answer file

segment.source: For a list of settings you can change, see Unattended Windows Setup Reference on the MSDN Hardware Dev Center.
segment.target: For a list of settings you can change, see Unattended Windows Setup Reference on the MSDN Hardware Dev Center.

segment.source: Create a Windows image using Windows ICD
segment.target: Create a Windows image using Windows ICD

segment.source: Introduced in Windows 10, Windows Imaging and Configuration Designer (ICD) streamlines the customizing and provisioning of a Windows 10 for desktop editions (Home, Pro, Enterprise, and Education), Windows 10 Mobile, or Windows 10 IoT Core (IoT Core) image.
segment.target: Introduced in Windows 10, Windows Imaging and Configuration Designer (ICD) streamlines the customizing and provisioning of a Windows 10 for desktop editions (Home, Pro, Enterprise, and Education), Windows 10 Mobile, or Windows 10 IoT Core (IoT Core) image.

segment.source: Here are some things you can do with Windows ICD:
segment.target: Here are some things you can do with Windows ICD:

segment.source: Build and apply a provisioning package
segment.target: Build and apply a provisioning package

segment.source: Export a provisioning package
segment.target: Export a provisioning package

segment.source: Build and deploy an image for Windows 10 for desktop editions
segment.target: Build and deploy an image for Windows 10 for desktop editions

segment.target: IT Pro Windows deployment tools
